alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton; Rankin; Scott; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 5:51AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jasper, western Newton, southeastern Rankin, Simpson, Smith and Scott Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 551 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Forkville to near Oma. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Forkville around 555 AM CDT. Hillsboro around 605 AM CDT. Harperville around 610 AM CDT. Steele around 620 AM CDT. Conehatta around 635 AM CDT. Prospect around 640 AM CDT. Magee and Stratton around 645 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Sylvarena, Mize, Sebastopol, Puckett, Polkville, D`Lo, Lake and Braxton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jasper; Newton; Rankin; Scott; Simpson; Smith
